Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-69420 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-38
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-69420 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-38. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssl is earlier than 1.1.1k-38, affected by CVE-2025-69420
